title: My bachelor's degree is from Sikkim Manipal University Distance Education. Which authority I should use for Canada ECA? WES doesn't recognize it. - Quora

response.answer_text: Try ICAS I hear success stories from ICAS, thought the wait period is way too long! http://www.canadavisa.com/canada-immigration-discussion-board/eca-of-sikkim-manipal-university-degree-t398704.0.html
Icas does it. But takes over 6 months. So if you have ample time to sparego for them.
